Text: What's the difference between this and the first upload of this episode?

Reason for REPACK from the NFO:

"old x264 build used, preset
very slow with ordered chapters"

I downloaded the original torrent and it's fine.

It appears the "excuse" for the Repack version is to comply with the "scene" rule which says the x264 encoder must be updated within 30 days of the release of a new version, so in reality there's no good reason for the Repack version to exist at all. In my opinion....
Do anyone know where to find the English subtitle of this vision?
